content.about: This is a parallel universe where everything is opposite of our world. In this universe, good is evil and vice versa. This universe is often portrayed in science fiction as a dark and sinister version of our own.

In this universe, people possess extraordinary abilities and use them to fight crime and protect the world. This universe is often characterized by flashy costumes and dramatic battles between heroes and villains.
In this universe, the zombie apocalypse has taken hold and the undead roam the earth. It is a world where the living must constantly fight to survive against the never-ending horde of zombies.

This is a world where technology has advanced far beyond our current level, but at the cost of privacy and freedom. The citizens of this world live in a highly monitored and controlled society, where corporations hold more power than governments.
This is a world where mages and humans coexist in harmoany. The mages are able to use magic to perform incredible feats, but they are also hunted by the government for their powers.
This is our beloved normal world. Our hero is here to search for the pets he lost in the other universes.
This universe is characterized by the culture, beliefs, and way of life of the ancient Vikings. In this world, warriors sail the seas in search of loot and glory.
